page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE.
page.content: Our names are Lindsay Cranmer and Andreas Schrocksnadel. We are fourth year juniors at Whickham Parochial School. As part of our work for our project we decided to visit Mrs.Pyle,who we think is the oldest person in Whickham. Mrs.Pyle was born in 1891 and she is almost 94 years old. She started school when she was 4 years old. She attended our school, although when she went to our school it was in the old building in the village which now belongs to the local council. The headmaster's house was next to the school building. the headmaster's name was Mr.Castles. Mrs.Pyle told us that he always had a strap in his hand ready to smack anyone who misbehaved. Mrs.Pyle didn't know when her family first moved to Whickham but her grandparents lived here.
